question: TS Vineeth Bhatt has been conferred with the 'Best astrologer of the world' award is belongs to ________.
explanation: Telangana's capital Hyderabad based astrologer and numerologist TS Vineeth Bhatt has been conferred with the 'Best astrologer of the world' award at the 'Russian-Indian economic dialogue' round-table meet held in Moscow. He is a personal astrologer to ministers, ambassadors, senators across the globe.
